titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3401) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2019, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3401) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2019, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-128, by Mr. McGovern.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3401 with 1 hour of general debate. Motion to recommit with or without instructions allowed.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 33.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 462.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 188 (Roll no. 409).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 189 (Roll no. 410).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3401) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2019.
